column5: hey guys  looking to buy a trailer for my small boat, any tips on where i should be looking to grab one?  i have looked at a few places so far and looks like trailerworld in brantford has the best price  thanks guys

what size you looking for and when do you need it? Are you willing to go used? I am in the market for a small boat, but have no need for the trailer. I have been looking only at boats that come without the trailer...but if I knew I had an instant taker of the trailer....
Lots of trailers for sale on Kijiji. I've seen prices for 12 -6 foot trailers from 300 to 2000 dollars.

i prefer new, i just picked up a pretty basic one from where i got my motor from a few months ago at cvs marine, grabbed the venture vb 1000  is there a big difference from regular to led lights? thinking i should have paid the extra $25 to have them on
Big difference, no more carrying around spare bulbs that seem to quit at the most inopportune time.  Everything is sealed.
